faq_subtitle: Everything You Need to Know Before Getting Started
faq_q1: Q. Can I integrate this with my online store or app?
faq_a1: Yes. We offer ready-made plugins for platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce, as well as API and SDK options for mobile apps or custom e-commerce systems.
faq_q2: Q. What payment methods do you support?
faq_a2: We support a wide range of payment methods including credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and various local payment options.
faq_q3: Q. Is there a setup fee or monthly charge?
faq_a3: No, there are no setup fees or monthly charges. You only pay a small transaction fee per successful payment.
faq_q4: Q. How long does the onboarding process take?
faq_a4: The onboarding process typically takes 1-3 business days, depending on the completeness of your documentation. We aim to get you up and running as quickly as possible.
faq_q5: Q. How quickly will I receive the funds?
faq_a5: Funds are typically settled within 2-3 business days after the transaction. Payout schedules can be customized based on your business needs.
faq_q6: Q. Is the platform secure and compliant?
faq_a6: Absolutely. Our platform is PCI DSS Level 1 compliant and uses advanced encryption and fraud detection tools to ensure the highest level of security for all transactions.
